description.zh-cn: 中国女歌唱家，中国音乐家协会会员，中国共产党党员，安徽师范大学音乐学院教授、硕士研究生导师、音乐表演专业负责人。
description.en: Chinese female singer, member of the Chinese Musicians Association, member of the Chinese Communist Party, and a professor, master's supervisor, and head of the music performance major at the School of Music, Anhui Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国安徽省芜湖市的一所省属重点师范大学，王琳的母校及任职单位。
description.en: A key provincial normal university located in Wuhu, Anhui Province, China. It is the alma mater and current employer of Wang Lin.

nodes.id: 全国青年歌手电视大奖赛

zh-cn: 全国青年歌手电视大奖赛

description.zh-cn: 一项由中国中央电视台举办的全国性青年歌手比赛。
description.en: A national singing competition for young singers hosted by China Central Television.

description.zh-cn: 中国各民族音乐家组成的全国性专业人民团体。
description.en: A national professional people's organization composed of musicians of all ethnic groups in China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于安徽省芜湖市的歌舞表演团体。
description.en: A song and dance performance troupe located in Wuhu City, Anhui Province.

description.zh-cn: 安徽省人民政府的组成部门，主管全省教育工作。
description.en: A component department of the Anhui Provincial People's Government, responsible for education work throughout the province.

description.zh-cn: 中国音乐界唯一的国家级综合性大奖。
description.en: The only national-level comprehensive award in the Chinese music industry.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家电视台。
description.en: The state broadcaster of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国中央电视台下属的艺术表演团体。
description.en: An artistic performance troupe affiliated with China Central Television.

description.zh-cn: 中国天津市的官方电视台。
description.en: The official television station of Tianjin, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国安徽省的官方电视台。
description.en: The official television station of Anhui Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 1990年至1995年，王琳担任芜湖市歌舞团独唱演员。
description.en: From 1990 to 1995, Wang Lin served as a solo singer for the Wuhu Song and Dance Troupe.

degree.zh-cn: 演唱专业学士、音乐学硕士
degree.en: Bachelor's degree in Vocal Performance, Master's degree in Musicology

description.zh-cn: 王琳于1995年考入安徽师范大学音乐学院，1999年毕业，并于2005年获得音乐学硕士学位。
description.en: Wang Lin was admitted to the School of Music at Anhui Normal University in 1995, graduated in 1999, and received a Master's degree in Musicology in 2005.

position.zh-cn: 教授、硕士研究生导师、音乐表演专业负责人
position.en: Professor, Master's Supervisor, Head of Music Performance Major

description.zh-cn: 自1999年毕业后，王琳留校任教，现任安徽师范大学音乐学院教授。
description.en: After graduating in 1999, Wang Lin stayed at the university to teach and is currently a professor at the School of Music, Anhui Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 王琳是中国音乐家协会会员。
description.en: Wang Lin is a member of the Chinese Musicians Association.

description.zh-cn: 王琳是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Wang Lin is a member of the Chinese Communist Party.

relationships.source: 全国青年歌手电视大奖赛

description.zh-cn: 2004年，王琳在第十一届全国青年歌手电视大奖赛中获得民族唱法铜奖，此奖项提升了她的专业声誉。
description.en: In 2004, Wang Lin won the bronze prize in the ethnic singing category at the 11th National Young Singer TV Grand Prix, which enhanced her professional reputation.

description.zh-cn: 王琳曾获第六届中国音乐金钟奖声乐比赛安徽赛区一等奖。
description.en: Wang Lin won the first prize in the Anhui division of the 6th Chinese Golden Bell Award for Music vocal competition.

description.zh-cn: 王琳主持了安徽省教育厅人文社会科学重点研究项目。
description.en: Wang Lin presided over key research projects in humanities and social sciences of the Anhui Provincial Department of Education.

description.zh-cn: 王琳曾应邀参加中央电视台“心连心”艺术团的演出活动。
description.en: Wang Lin was invited to participate in the performance activities of the CCTV "Heart to Heart" Art Troupe.

description.zh-cn: “心连心”艺术团是中国中央电视台下属的艺术表演团体。
description.en: The "Heart to Heart" Art Troupe is an artistic performance troupe affiliated with China Central Television.

description.zh-cn: 王琳曾应邀参加天津电视台的演出活动。
description.en: Wang Lin was invited to participate in performance activities for Tianjin Television.

description.zh-cn: 王琳曾应邀参加安徽电视台“正月正”元宵晚会等演出活动。
description.en: Wang Lin was invited to participate in performance activities such as the "Zhengyue Zheng" Lantern Festival Gala for Anhui Television.
